meanings.definition: The quality of being quiet, gentle, and easily imposed on; submissive.
meanings.sent1: Her meekness was evident in the way she always listened quietly to others.
meanings.sent2: The meekness of the kitten made it a favorite among the children.
meanings.sent3: Despite his meekness, the puppy managed to steal the treat from the table.
meanings.sent4: The meekness of the breeze belied the strength of the upcoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The meekness of the flower's petals contrasted with the boldness of its color.
